title: That tipografias seen in pictures?
content:
I need the name of the fonts used in these images, thank you very much for your help, greetings friends.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6459.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%202_5283.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%203_3989.jpg)
author: angelmois

comments.content:
\_USA\_ Princetown [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/princetown/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/princetown/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/princetown/")  
\_NEW YORK\_ [edited: I had Rama Gothic Cond, but the bowl on the R is not angular]  
Don
Thank you very much, I hope other friends help me with the other typefaces, Greetings

NEW YORK: [HI United](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/unitedcollection) Serif Condensed squooshed (vertically stretched/horizontally compressed) should do the job perfectly  
VIRGINIA: don't have the time to spot the right at the moment, /R leg bottom right-sided serif should be the key; have a look [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742/http:/typophile.com/node/107362#comment-567111) for tracks

EDIT: got a good one for Virginia, [Superstar M54](http://web.archive.org/web/20140331084742/http:/www.dafont.com/superstar-m54.font).
